# PLAYER::PLAYER_ID

## Summary
Gets the player index for the main player. This is the same as GET_PLAYER_INDEX()

## Returns
* **PLAYER_INDEX**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This returns YOUR 'identity' as a Player type.

Always returns 0 in story mode.
